data.name: FileFilter_SupportedArchives
data.value: All Supported Files|*.arc;*.szs;*.szp;*.carc;*.app;*.aaf|Resource Archive|*.arc|YAZ0 Identified Archive|*.szs|YAY0 Identified Archive|*.szp|U8 Archive|*.szs;*.carc;*.app|Audio Archive File|*.szs;*.aaf|All Files|*.*

data.name: MessageBoxMsg_MandatoryUpdateNotice
data.comment: {0} is replaced by Github URL {1} is replaced with Release Notes

data.name: MessageBoxMsg_OptionalUpdateNotice
data.comment: {0} replaced with Github URL {1} is replaced with Release Notes

data.name: MessageBoxMsg_UnsavedChangesNotice
data.value: You have unsaved changes, are you sure you want to proceed?

data.name: MessageBoxMsg_NotSupportedArchiveFormat
data.value: The file you tried to open is not supported.

data.name: MessageBoxMsg_ArchiveFormatReadError
MessageBoxMsg_SZPMismatch
data.value: The chosen encoding type doesn't match the file extension. SZP files are supposed to be YAY0 Encoded, would you like to switch to YAY0 Strong?

data.name: MessageBoxMsg_SZSMismatch
data.value: The chosen encoding type doesn't match the file extension. SZS files are supposed to be YAZ0 Encoded, would you like to switch to YAZ0 Strong?

data.name: MessageBoxMsg_ExportDirectoryOverwriteWarning
data.value:
The output directory already exists! "{0}" Some of the contents may be overwritten.
Proceed?
data.comment: {0} is replaced with a Folder Path

data.name: StatusStrip_RenamedItem
data.comment: {0} is replaced with the original filename {1} is replaced with the new filename

data.name: MessageBoxMsg_DragDropUseRightClickHint
data.value: If you are trying to drag an item onto your desktop, use the Right Mouse Button to do so.
data.comment: Translate "Right Mouse Button" to whatever the secondary mouse button is called.

data.name: MessageBoxMsg_ItemWithTheSameNameError
data.value: An item with the name "{0}" already exists at "{1}"
data.comment: {0} is replaced with a string {1} is replaced with a string

data.name: StatusStrip_SelectedFolderStats
data.comment: {0} is replaced with the selected folder name {1} is replaced with a number saying how many files are inside the selected folder {2} is replaced with a number saying how many folders are inside the selected folder

data.name: StatusStrip_SelectedFileStats
data.comment: {0} is replaced with the selected folder name {1} is replaced with a number saying how large the selected file is (in bytes) {2} is replaced with a CRC32 hash of the file's data

data.name: InvalidOperationException_ProcessExitedWithCode
data.comment: {0} replaced with a process exit code (number)

data.name: MessageBoxMsg_UserCompressionExecuteFailure
MessageBoxMsg_UserCompressionParseFailure
StatusStrip_InProgressCompression
data.comment: {0} replaced with the name of the encoding {1} replaced with a number

data.name: StatusStrip_SaveCompleteCompression
data.comment: {0} is replaced with a number {1} is replaced with a Timestamp

data.name: String_NewArchiveRootName
data.comment: Make sure the translated text does not have spaces

data.name: String_NewArchiveGuide
data.value: Select an Archive Format on the left.

data.name: ArchiveFormat_JSystemRARC_Description
data.value:
The archive format used in JSystem
Supported games include: - Pikmin - Luigi's Mansion - Super Mario Sunshine - The Legend of Zelda: The Wind Waker - Mario Kart: Double Dash!! - Donkey Kong Jungle Beat - The Legend of Zelda: Twilight Princess - Super Mario Galaxy - Super Mario Galaxy 2
data.comment: Translate Game names according to the name of the game in the region the language belongs to. For example, "Super Mario Galaxy" becomes "Super Mario Wii" for Korean.

data.name: ArchiveFormat_JSystemAAF_Description
data.value:
A JSystem audio archive used for storing a select few files
Supported games include: - Super Mario Galaxy - Super Mario Galaxy 2
data.comment: Translate Game names according to the name of the game in the region the language belongs to. For example, "Super Mario Galaxy" becomes "Super Mario Wii" for Korean.

data.name: ArchiveFormat_NW4RArchive_Description
data.value:
The archive format used in NW4R
Supported games include: - Super Paper Mario - Mario Kart Wii - Metroid: Other M - Sonic Colors [Wii] - Mario and Sonic at the London 2012 Olympic Games - The Legend of Zelda: Skyward Sword - Rodea the Sky Soldier
